62509
Test: public void testSubClassSerializerInvokedForBaseClassFieldsHoldingSubClassInstances() { Gson gson = new GsonBuilder() .registerTypeAdapter(Base.class, new BaseSerializer()) .registerTypeAdapter(Sub.class, new SubSerializer()) .create(); ClassWithBaseField target = new ClassWithBaseField(new Sub()); JsonObject json = (JsonObject) gson.toJsonTree(target); JsonObject base = json.get("base").getAsJsonObject(); }
Code: public <T2> TypeAdapter<T2> create(Gson gson, TypeToken<T2> typeToken) { final Class<? super T2> requestedType = typeToken.getRawType(); if (!clazz.isAssignableFrom(requestedType)) { return null; } return (TypeAdapter<T2>) typeAdapter; }
